DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on behalf of the signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on your behalf.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from your personal contacts.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts without a signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.
